mapper.select: select top 100 u.StationID, u.Datatime, u.ATMP, u.WTMP, u.RDataTime, u.Trantype, u.Sourcetype, u._MASK_FROM_V2 from ST_TMP_R u

select top 32768 b.StationID, b.datatime, a.data, a.dataplus, b.ATMP, b.WTMP from ST_TMP_R b left join water a on a.datatime = b.Datatime and a.stationid = b.StationID where b.StationID = #{StationID} order by b.Datatime desc
